purpose: A React component that provides a customizable scroll area with styled scrollbars using Radix UI's ScrollArea primitive

variables.name: ScrollArea
variables.purpose: Main scroll area container component that wraps content with custom scrollbars
variables.usage: Wraps children content to provide scrollable area with styled scrollbars

variables.name: ScrollBar
variables.purpose: Custom scrollbar component with styling for both vertical and horizontal orientations
variables.usage: Rendered inside ScrollArea to provide visual scrollbar with custom styling

key_points: Uses Radix UI's ScrollArea primitive for accessibility and functionality
Implements two main components: ScrollArea and ScrollBar
Uses React.forwardRef for proper ref forwarding
Supports both vertical and horizontal scrollbar orientations
Applies custom styling with Tailwind CSS classes via the cn utility

patterns: Component composition pattern using Radix UI primitives
forwardRef pattern for proper ref handling in compound components
CSS-in-JS pattern using Tailwind classes with cn utility for conditional styling
Compound component pattern with ScrollArea containing ScrollBar
displayName assignment for better debugging experience
issues: ScrollBar component is hardcoded inside ScrollArea, limiting customization of scrollbar visibility
No prop to control scrollbar auto-hide behavior
ScrollBar component is not exported but could be useful for custom implementations
No support for custom scrollbar styling through props
Missing TypeScript type exports for component props
